kpi.name: M1009C301

kpi_info.title: LTE CS FALLBACK IN PREP FAIL DUE TO NAS
kpi_info.use: The number of incoming LTE CS fallback ISHO preparation failures because of non-access stratum cause. Also M1009C280 is updated along with this counter. UPDATED: When the RNC sends RANAP: RELOCATION FAILURE to the CN during incoming LTE CS ISHO with cause in category "non-access stratum cause".

kpi.kpi_alias: LTE CS FALLBACK IN PREP FAIL DUE TO NAS
